website_summaries.verdict: Whether you like to write in color or classic blue or black, Paper Mate has the pens to accommodate your style in this versatile yet practical set.
pros: Ballpoint pen in a variety of bright colors, plus blue and back
Great for artistic purposes or for color-coding items
Click tops keep the retractable tips hidden when not in use
Streamlined barrels fit nicely in the hand, and are easy to control
cons: Mixed opinions on how well the pens write, as some colors seem to be smoother than others
Occasional dried-out pens upon arrival noted

customer_reviews.title: Remove the protector from the tip before using.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5th grader as part of his school supplies list. At first he didn't think they worked. There is a little piece on the end of the tip you have to remove. Once we removed those, they pens worked great. Maybe that is obvious but just in case you have the same experience my son had, I wanted to point that out. They seem better than the cheap pens we have around the house. We got medium point so I cannot comment on the fine point.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: For my workplace they are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am a manager in a greasy restaurant. Oil based and water based liquids are spilled often enough wherever I am doing paperwork unless I am in the office then it's my drink ring on the desk getting my papers wet. These pens write on paper that is oily, wet, or dried that has been wet or has had the oil hastily wiped off. Great pens, cheap but feel nice in my hand. I have actually been using exclusively these pens for about 4 years now. Update. I have used hundreds of these pens. And now I have had exactly 1 bust and bleed all over my pocket. Pretty awesome failure rate in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Better than quills
customer_reviews.text: Noted author and raconteur Biff Rafferty and I were doodling on butcher paper in a cafe on the Baeleric islands recently. I was intrigued by by how easily his pen drifted over the page, like little gobbets of pork fat in a hot skittle. These pens were smooth, with the tight feel of a Pinniped dancing through the Ocean. The spring is taut. The heft is good. Scribbling while downing Retsina...is there a better life?
customer_reviews.author: B. Eric

customer_reviews.title: To each their own.
customer_reviews.text: They write very smooth, once it starts writing. Mine skipped a bit before I started writing. They have a triangle shape so people know in case they are not use to it. The triangle shape is nice for me. Has wax on the ends so it is not dried out when you get them.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Writer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & True to Color!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pens to start (late) 2019/2020 planner. I like a little pop of color in my life and these pens held up to my expectations. Writing is smooth and there aren't any skips in the ink. The colors are wonderful, with the baby blue one being my absolute favorite. I'm not sure how much ink is in them exactly, but as of right now, I'm very happy with my purchase and I would buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Owens

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Great number of pens for the price. Nice variety of bright colors. However, they do not write very smoothly. The feel is pretty cheap. And many of the pens I have tried so far leave small globs of ink while writing. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: boomersgang

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need(ed)
customer_reviews.text: I’m picky about the pens I use at work. They have to be blue, they have to be ballpoint (not gel), they have to be click pens and they need not to have a rubber comfort thingie (because those are a pain to get in and out of the pen holder I use on my bullet journal). These are perfect. They write smoothly and I love the triangle barrel that makes them comfortable in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Insert interesting name

customer_reviews.title: 20 year school teacher approved
customer_reviews.text: my wife is a 20 year teach who still grades lots of papers. we just bought 3 different kinds and she loves these the best. the triangle feel fits her hand great. the amount of ink and how well it flows out is just right. We will be ordering these again when she runs out.
customer_reviews.author: C5Galaxy

customer_reviews.title: nice, smooth
customer_reviews.text: My 8th grader loves these keeps her notes organized. The colors are bright and good quality pens InkJoy pens are the best ones on the market today. The ink flows smoothly and the pens never skip. I love using different colors when I write and this pack gives you 10 different colors and two sets of each one for upstairs and one for downstairs perfect. I love using different colors when I write and this pack gives you 10 different colors and two sets of each one for upstairs and one for downstairs perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: These are the Best~🙌🏻💙❤️🍃💦
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I live the colors!!!!! They write always, wonderfully, on a variety of paper, easily, without a rubber or latex end grub (which I’m allergic to) with a click on and off. And I love the Color assortment!! It’s wonderful. I definitely recommend this. My favorites are blue, brown, PURPLE, black then..., red, pink, green... Etc based on how easy they write and favorite coloring. Purple seems to write easily with various amounts of pressure. Being a reader, I mark in books. So that helps me. Blue, green, orange, yep. They do great. I love them. No bleeding through as long as you don’t push too hard in the thinnest bible pages. I love them. 💚❤️🧡😊💜
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great Pens
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite pens! The tip is small so my writing doesn't look like one giant blob, and it dries quickly on paper. If you use it to write cards though, I would be careful as it smears on the somewhat shiny surface. If you're looking for a good work pen, I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Stop with the brown. I buy color packs for CoLoRs!
customer_reviews.text: They write smooth and are vibrantly colored. I do wish they had some sort of grip on them. My biggest gripe is the same one I have with Pilot for their G2 color pack. If I am paying this much it's bc I want bright, FUN colors. Stop putting s*** brown in these packs! They just sit there and it's a waste of $$$
customer_reviews.author: SteepwithAmber

customer_reviews.title: Best pen
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pens, actually my only pens. I used them when I was teaching and continue to now. I still write a lot!! My husband, who also had a favorite pen, has been won over by the feel of the pen and the smooth glide of it on paper. I have been a lifelong pen collector. These are the best ones I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne m Kodak

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleasantly Surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly shocked at the great quality of these pens, I was actually looking for planner accessories and stumbled across these pens, for the price, I thought “Why not?” and put them in my cart, I figured if they were junk I’d just throw them away, no big deal. I was pleasantly surprised when I received these, they are terrific!! These pens are actually triangular, which very comfortably fits in your hand just perfect! I mean, these are no high end pens, but for everyday writing with cool colors, they hit the mark, greatly exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: OnNiMoNsTeR

customer_reviews.title: Great pen - doesn’t smudge, leak, and writes very smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: Being an RN, we all work very closely when writing orders, doing charts, and recording lab values. After several weeks of noticing that my Papermate pens seemed to be the first to disappear. I asked the other nurses about “the missing pens” and they all remarked that mine were the best writing pens on our unit. So I have written down there birthdays and I have started giving each a box of these pens for there birthdays. Great writing pen. Doesn’t leak or smudge. Guess I will be purchasing a box for all the birthdays coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite pens
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these by accident because I thought I had ordered the gel pens. That being said, I am so happy I made the mistake of purchasing these because they are absolutely wonderful. The pens write smoothly and glide across the paper with ease. The colors of the ink are bright and vibrant. These are much cheaper than the ones I usually buy from this brand and now these will be my go-to pens. Try these if want a more affordable pen that looks and write just as nice as the gel pens.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Now I understand what the fuss is about
customer_reviews.text: My fellow coworkers rave about Ink Joy pens. If you can use multi-colors for work, get these to add a bit of fun! They write well--no globs since I've been using them (several months), plus they are pretty in a pencil holder on the desk. :)
customer_reviews.author: SLP

customer_reviews.title: Love at first write!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the Paper Mate InkJoy pens for several years. This size package was a great bargain. Love the colors and smoothness in writing. I use them in my devotional/bible study and they work great. I also have a boring desk job and I use them for note taking at meetings or during conference calls. It’s helped keep me organized in that I take notes from certain days in a particular color. When I see a page with pink notes I know it was from my Wednesday call. I also print emails that need attention and use different colors for different levels of priority. I used to print certain topics on different colored paper, but this can get expensive.
customer_reviews.author: crazy4bks

customer_reviews.title: All the pens actually write
customer_reviews.text: Unlike with it's competitor, pilot, all these pens worked outside the package. You know how you spend roughly $25 on pilot pens and expect ALL of them to work? But you always have those two or three pens that just flat out won't write or if they do you have to repeat certain lines or curves, which honestly who has that kind of time to deal with? The only minor complaint I have is that the yellow pen may be a little too light in color but in general I'm switching over to papermate gel pens, cause I get my damn money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Urdie

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ink and vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: My mother originally gave me these pens when she no longer used office supplies regularly, and I love them. I love writing in different colors, especially for different days. These pens are easy to hold onto as the body is triangular. The ink comes out smooth and consistently, not too thick or thin. They last a long time too! No fading, either.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Howard

customer_reviews.title: FAiLED GrApHiCs!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh out of the pack I noticed several pens had some of the graphics peeling near the top, where the retractable push button is located. Which sucks; since the graphics are the whole reason I purchased the pens in the first place. On a high note, I must say the pens (the few that I've used thus far) are very smooth and fluid to write with.
customer_reviews.author: The "Eagle Eye" Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean writing, when they work.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the writing quality when they work, unfortunately the ink hardly ever gets through to the tip. I think the wax tip protectors they come with end up getting pieces inside and clogging the ink flow. I spend more time getting these pens to produce ink than writing with them. Cheap bic pens may be messier for writing, but at least they're predictable.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bontrager

customer_reviews.title: Leaking pens!
customer_reviews.text: These things leak like crazy!!! I really like how they feel and write. I had brought a previous box for work, and they leaked, but then the Amazon page said "new model". so I thought maybe they came out with a new model because they leak so bad. I bought another box...thinking this is nice, I will have the good pen and it won't leak!!! They leak as bad or worse. I wear a lab coat at work, and my pocket is terribly stained, and my nice jacket may be ruined. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Not As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to use this particular brand of pen for work and he goes through them rather quickly. I purchased this item expecting a box of 12 pens, instead I received a sealed poly bag with 6 sets of 2 pens. In other words, I could have gone to any other store and simply taken 6 packs off a shelf. Very disappointed that they were not in fact a 12 pack of pens. Yes, they still do the same functions, but its about the concept of having a box of pens to gift someone vs a bag full of packages.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Stepnik

customer_reviews.title: Ink Joy ballpoint
customer_reviews.text: I like the vibrant colors, the smooth writing feel and the easy retractable click option. I do find that these are prone to giving an 'ink blob' start, but as long as you know this it's not a big deal. The price is great for the amount of pens and colors, and they look nice and sleek in the color matched barrel. If you aren't expecting too much, these are practically perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: I think these are the best ballpoint pens.
customer_reviews.text: I was sitting at my table writing with one of these pens I had purchased several years ago. It was writing so nicely , I thought, "I should order more." So I found these exact pens, loved the price and received them quickly!! They all write like a dream!! No skipping or smudging. I mainly use G2 gel pens, but for ballpoint, these are incredible. Build, vibrant colors and smooooooooth. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: teachteacha

customer_reviews.title: Constantly coming apart
customer_reviews.text: These pens are mediocre at best for two reasons. First, they constantly become unscrewed. During regular use, the two parts of the pen simply unscrew. It's quite annoying to have to stop writing, screw the pen back together, and continue. Second, if you don't use the pen for a little while, it doesn't write well when you pick it back up. I have to constantly scribble on a piece of scratch paper to get the ink flowing before actually using the pen for writing.
customer_reviews.author: PWilks

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: The blues and the purple are perfect, the color is bright and the ink flows really well. The orange and green are not great though. The orange did not have the protective dot on the tip that prevents the ink from drying out and I believe that's why it was so bad for me. The black and red are okay. The ink did not smudge on the notebook paper but it did smudge on the sticky note.
customer_reviews.author: Ambar

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made - Not the Same Product Sold in Stores
customer_reviews.text: These pens have been my favorite writing pens after I found them at Target several years ago. I liked the size and the weight distribution. I was excited to find them sold in this quantity for the price. After receiving them, I am unhappy with the quality. They are lighter and cheaply made in comparison to what I have purchased in the Target store. After receiving the pens, I compared this pen to a pen purchased from Target (in the 2 packs), and they do not feel the same. They are lighter and have cheaper caps. I am very disappointed with this purchase and will not be buying these again on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ammons

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these reliable pens!
customer_reviews.text: I am a writer and it drives me crazy when you can't trust the ink-flow of a pen. These pens give a consistent, dependable ink-flow from the first to the last drop of ink! I have seriously only had one pen give me spotty ink, and that was after buying three of these cases! They have a great life span and won't let you down! The feel took a little getting used to, as it is three-sided, but I find that they don't slip nor bother the fingers. The dependability of these pens, plus the nice consistency of their ink, makes them a win-win to me.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The ink is so smooth, like buttah
customer_reviews.text: These pens are great, they write from the moment you put them to paper and the triangular design is easy to hold. I got these is a click pen because having to recap was not working out on the go. Blue is hard to find, but this was a good deal. The pens have a transparent blue tube, not clear like it looks like on the box in the picture. Will be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: this person

customer_reviews.title: Great Pens!
customer_reviews.text: These write straight out of the package, without needing any doodles to get the ink flowing. They write smoothly and look nice. With the exception of the green, which could have been darker, the colors are vibrant and easy to read. I had no idea I could be so pleased with a ballpoint pen!
customer_reviews.author: GypsiTop Contributor: Bollywood

customer_reviews.title: Ink Joy is amazing but the pens from this seller...
customer_reviews.text: Ink joy is the best, nothing to say about the pens because yeah it’s amazing! But the box from this seller came in a white unmarked box and most pens have some mechanical issues and seem low on ink and they all have barcode stickers...
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: Writes smooth, falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: Usually these are my favorite pens, but the last order I received must have been a bad batch. The pens disassemble while writing and the ink core pops out while the spring flys out of the body. I love the ink joy pens, they write smooth, and the grip is comfortable but the construction of the pen itself has not stood up to my expectations of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pens!!
customer_reviews.text: These are always my “go to” pen. I am one of those people who still uses a color coded calendar that I keep on my fridge. Our twins are Juniors now so we are getting invitations from everywhere to go tour colleges all over the US. And still keep up with homework, volunteering, athletics, extra projects, student government, appointments for braces... These pens write so smoothly and easily and last a long time. I keep several complete sets around the house in a few different rooms so I always have some on hand. Recommend hands down. I just wish they made them in about 50 colors!!
customer_reviews.author: QueenLeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fo those who write a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these pens. My first time trying them were at work, right then is when I knew I had to order my own box. This pen is great for those who does a lot of writing. It’s very comfortable to grip, writes smoothly, ink just flows. Doesn’t leave my finger with a callus.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Rethickulous

customer_reviews.title: Clear Writing, No Globs!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pens are my go-to for any ink pen. The retractable click type works extremely well. Color never fades or globs!! Would recommend for a left-hander as the ink does not pool up. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: audichix

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my third graders to use for writing. They LOVE them. The price meant I could buy a few packs and put a bin of them out for the kids to share. They are so much more excited about writing time now because they get to write in color :) We also do much more rainbow writing now which helps them to separate each part of their work, blue for the topic sentence, red for the reasons, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Simple, agreeable design and GREAT writing feel that puts most disposables to shame
customer_reviews.text: I like these for a couple reasons. The thickness and color of the lines are both awesome. The balls run smoothly. When the pens arrived, each tip had a tiny protective bit of plastic preventing it drying out. And the satisfying thickness of the shaft makes for a really fatigue-free grip even writing for a long time. But my very favorite part is that the grip area has no other junk added to it! It's perfectly smooth, and since I like to stick pens up under my hat to tote around work (only the engineers still wear them in their pockets... nerds lol), this is GREAT!!!! They don't mess up my hair! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel MackintoshTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with these pens
customer_reviews.text: They've made me become a pen snob--won't use anything else! I love how smooth they write, how the ink dries immediately, and how comfortable they are to hold. I love to order the assorted back and use different colors for different subjects so I can look through my notes and find pertinent information faster. It's a true medium point which I also like and I find them to last quite a long time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Too lazy to go to the store
customer_reviews.text: I bought these from Amazon, just because I was too lazy to go to the store. I have lost every pen that I own. I bought these because I am a writer and always keep a pen by my bed. I was at home writing and didn't feel like going into town to buy pens, so I purchased a box from my addiction...Amazon. These work great. I love the way they write.
customer_reviews.author: Ccbilbo

customer_reviews.title: Bright Colors & Great Ink Pens
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I wanted ball point pens in different colors. There are a ton of pens and the colors are all bright and vibrant. As with any ball point pen, you have to scribble on a piece of paper to get them to smooth out, but then all colors write super smoothly for journals and notebooks.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Inkjoy is my fav
customer_reviews.text: I use several versions of the Inkjoy pens. Any and all of them are great. The reason I like this one so much is the it is great for putting in a notebook for taking on the go. The clip on the side works really good on a notebook binder. I never use anything besides an Inkjoy pen if I have the choice. PaperMate is one of the best companies around. They have wonderful customer service and wonderful products.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: I love ink joy ink how smooth it is ,BUT,this particular pen is very cheap .As in dont put in your scrub side cargo pocket for more than a few minutes because it will come apart and not easily put back together. These are good for office use and not meant to be carried in pockets for any long period of time.If you want a really good pen :INK JOY original (in white push pen) Really good and lasts a very long time with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: LadyT

customer_reviews.title: Plastic feels different, but still writes well.
customer_reviews.text: Feels different than my other inkjoy pens. The grip and ink quality is great. The overall pen quality feels less than the other inkjoy pens I have. While they do serve their purpose and are probably better for the environment, perhaps using less plastic, they’re not quite what I was expecting for gift purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: ink is pale and hard to see color is washed out
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT confuse with the good quality ink joy gel paper mate pens These pens are a cheaper low quality only good perhaps for kids to play with. The ink is pale and hard to see. They skip and are generally not good to write with if you are looking for the bold vibrant colors of gel pens. I ended up throwing the whole lot of these in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: PLM

customer_reviews.title: Nice pen but...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a red pen for proofreading and I wanted something retractable and that's what I got. The barrel is triangular, I guess to make it easier to hold, but it almost feels a little too narrow. Even though it says its a medium-sized point, the line is very fine. All in all, the BIC Cristal pens (the cheap ones) work just as well so I would get those before these.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good Pens
customer_reviews.text: These are good for what they are...low priced disposables. Great for when you need an inky ballpoint, and for a situation where you may or will loose or damage it. My use primarily consists of strategically placing them where I need pens from time to time, but don't need a fancier pen. They also work great for my crossword books from the grocery store with the newspaper type pages. Easy to hold, and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Great Flow!
customer_reviews.text: I love pens, and my kids love doing Spirograph art however its hard to find a pen that will get the job done. These bad boys are perfect for Spirograph art and just general use. Very smooth writing and bright colors. Happy!! LOVE Papermate! AND A BOX TOP ON THE BACK!? Super Bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: SonicSweeti

customer_reviews.title: My MIL's favorite pen for her crosswords
customer_reviews.text: I get these for my mother-in-law to use in her crossword books. She prefers these to just about any other pen we've tried. They dry quickly, are easy to hold and the medium point is perfect for her needs. I've purchased these several times and will probably continue to do so. They are more expensive than the regular stick pens, but she likes them better.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for note taking
customer_reviews.text: When taking a class that requires tons of note taking these pens are perfect. In my A&P classes I would take notes in one color from the slides and then during lecture, use another color to add detail or notable things to the work I previously did. They are smooth and true to color. All the colors show up nicely and are easy to ready.
customer_reviews.author: stephanee

customer_reviews.title: Love the pens
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the pens skipping as previous reviews mentioned but they were a good price so I went ahead and purchased. I LOVE THESE PENS! The color is vibrant (except for the green colors). I would recommend if you wanted an inexpensive starter pack of corful pens. I use these for study notes.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pens!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pens!!! They write sooo smoothly and I love all the color choices. I have used these daily for 5 years. I continue to purchase more anytime I run out of ink in them. Love them so much it. These pens have ruined me where now it bothers me to use any other kind of pen haha. Try them. You will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Decent pens.
customer_reviews.text: Worked good and came with a wide variety but I feel like some were not constructed well. As in ink will sometimes come out of the tips and get on things. so far we have managed to avoid getting it on anything important but im sure it will eventually happen. However, you get a lot for the price so it was still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Maybe old or defective? Not like other Ink Joy pens I've bought.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE ink joy pens. However the pkg I received must've been old or defective. Some of the pens wouldn't even write like they were out of or void of ink. The ones that did write did not glide across the paper like the ink joy pens I've grown to love. I wish I had tested them as soon as I received them. I would've sent them back for refund. I am bummed I got a bad batch of pens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging horrible, Pens work as expected
customer_reviews.text: The pens arrived very quickly and function as expected. They write pretty smooth, however I only tested one pen in the pack. I bought the pens as a gift for my “other half” because I always use (and then loose) his pens. My only complaint is the product’s packaging. It’s really obvious that the pens were pre-opened. Definitely not a box of brand new pens. They arrived with two large pieces of tape holding the package together. The pens were already slipping out the bottom. To my relief, all the pens still had their wax balls on the retractable tips. I’m giving them to my other half WITHOUT packaging, so he won’t worry too much about their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Like all of a sudden a little blob at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: okay raised a star. How often do you see brown pens? Also omg I love these and yes I will be buying them again. The light green is ugly though. I guess they just needed to be used a bit to work well. They write smoothly but the ink comes out / shows chunky sometimes. Like all of a sudden a little blob at the end of a letter. It’s annoying. Debated between 3 and 4 Stars but I won’t be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for servers
customer_reviews.text: Great pens! Fun colors. I’m a server and go through an astronomical amount of pens. Out of 5 packs I haven’t had 1 dud. They all write smoothly. They don’t break or unroll in my pockets. Only 3 or 4 ink bursts. They also don’t have the soft grip... something you might need if your writing for a while... but it’s just a crumb magnet for me. So not having that is a bonus. If you write on the light green ‘guest check’ books the orange and bright green are pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: papermate used to be my go-to for affordable and long lasting pens. Pens i could use til the ink ran out instead of til they dried. But this pack? Its been terrible. Constant interruptions in ink flow, splotchy lines where the ink didnt come out uniform. Overall? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Brings a smile to my face on a bus ride - what more can you ask for
customer_reviews.text: I'm going through pens, search a word books, and earbuds "like water" on the bus ride to/from work. This is a great price. I love the thicker point. It makes some beautiful colors and I find myself doodling in the margins. Smiling on my commute is a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: JillybeanTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: The Write Stuff
customer_reviews.text: These pens are simply brilliant. I love that each comes with a tip protector so that the ink is fresh at first use. The ink does not bleed on paper surfaces which makes them excellent for writing notes or checks. I got these for various colour coded writing that I had in mind, they are perfect for this. I would highly recommend these to students heading back to school, for office needs and art projects [All the colours are great for drawing]. This was a good buy and I shall purchase these again, especially since my girlfriend took this set as her own.
customer_reviews.author: schnellerals299792458ms

customer_reviews.title: The ink globs up
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the colors and the packaging of these. I purchased these on an impulse because they looked so pretty! I hate how they write. They glob up and smear. They work well if you're scribbling--not to write. I won't purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn K.

customer_reviews.title: Not as vibrant as anticipated
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, and I can't complain about the price. They do write very lightly though, almost in pastels. The only one that comes out pretty bright is the pink, but only 1 of the pink is bright, the other is soft like a pastel as well. But they're not horrible. I'm satisfied for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money! No Functional ink in pens.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set and was extremely disappointed. Not the quality of pen from Paper Mate that I was expecting. While the exterior of the pen was attractive and ergonomic the pens did not function! The ink was dry on multiple pens (yes I removed the wax tip) - some pens made a small ink mark or two when scribbled- others made no marks at all. I will not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I don't love these pens. They don't write on post-it notes very well (which I do a lot at work), and ink is even skipping on regular paper. They also seem to leak little ink drips everywhere. Whenever I use these I end up with little ink marks all over my hands. The pens are ok, but not anything special and I probably would not order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Flow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pens and have gone through about 5 that all have the same characteristics. When writing the ink will stop flowing till i shake/poke/scribble. I've had them sitting in a cup tip down for a week hoping that would work and it hasn't changed anything. I do service work and wanted a good pen for writing work orders but these end up showing random scribbles to the customer because of the pen stopping mid letter because of the transfer paper. Other than none of them working properly I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb pens, great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent pens are a very reasonable price. Many years ago I used to use slightly different Paper Mate pens at work and they were always great quality and wrote very well. That is the reason I tried these. I like the fact that these pens are retractable. The price is great and the quality is superb on these. You cannot go wrong with these pens.
customer_reviews.author: Maine BoyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great pens and colors
customer_reviews.text: I have been loving these pens and using all the different colors!! They are cute on my desk too! Love that the are not super thick ballpoint too
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Best pens!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite pens! I bought a pack of these for my son to use at school. I thought they were just the typical cheap pens. I was wrong! I loved them so much that I don't want to use any other type of pen now. I do a lot of writing, so I had to stock up woth this large box. The box arrived slightly crushed, but the pens were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: A reliable and fun pen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on sale for $5.09 here, on Amazon. I used to be an inventory specialist at Staples so I tried my fair share of pens and these are reliable, durable, great for on the go pens. I would recommend these, specifically, as gifts, for students, or if you're buying in moderate bulk but don't want boring bic pens.
customer_reviews.author: Indra

customer_reviews.title: Good pens for price
customer_reviews.text: Got these just to try and because there are 2 in brown ink which you don’t find often. Good pens I like the medium point. I would like better if they had a cushion on end versus the triangle shape but knew that before purchasing. Still got them cheaper here just to try vs going to store . Good pens and lots of fun colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pens, fun colors
customer_reviews.text: I got these to keep my notes fun and separate chapters in my notebooks. Overall I really like these pens. The colors are bold and long lasting. If I really have one complaint, it's that I've noticed one pen of each color has a little less consistent flow or dull writing. Nothing bad, but it's not as heavy of a flow as the other pen in that color. But, that's not a huge deal to me and it still gets what I need on the page. I'll definitely get these again when I need new pens.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wittorp

customer_reviews.title: too light to see the ink
customer_reviews.text: These colors in the photo are less on paper. The ink is weak, too light to even see. I have to write over my handwriting several times to see the ink. Waste of money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pen
customer_reviews.text: I buy this style in bulk in black ink because it is the perfect fit for my hand and provides consistently smooth writing. This color pack offering is a great addition to by desk set and has the same quality standards. Packaging was as pictured. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tayelor

customer_reviews.title: When You Have to Use a Ballpoint Pen
customer_reviews.text: I hate ballpoint pens. I usually buy Uniball 207 Retractable 207 gel pens by the box. But sometimes and some media demand ballpoint. These Paper Mate Inkjoy Retractable Ballpoint pens are the smoothest and most dependable I have used lately. I guess I’ll get a Fisher Space Pen to fill the void when needed.
customer_reviews.author: COL TK

customer_reviews.title: very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: These pens write very smoothly and evenly, with no skipping. They have pretty, vibrant colors. HIGHLY recommend. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Barely decent
customer_reviews.text: Four pens in the set did not work - despite several attempts. And another three can't be clicked close. Once clicked open they got sort of stuck ! I agree it's not a very expensive set, but one expects things to work the way they should.
customer_reviews.author: MSN

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: These parts are kinda crappy. The colors aren't great, and the writing isn't particularly smooth, but that's all fine. What made me mad, is the fact that 3 of my pens have now randomly broken. I'm just writing and the top pops off. I dont write hard, and I'm not an over clicker so I dont understand why 3 of them have now broken.
customer_reviews.author: Paddison

customer_reviews.title: These are my go-to pen and have been since they came out
customer_reviews.text: I've been a loyal inkjoy 550 buyer since they released them, and nothing has changed. They write very smoothly and pleasantly, the ink is vibrant and opaque, they last a long time, and the color selection is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Pens!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky when it comes to pens and these meet the mark! They don't smear easily. They don't give you globes of ink. They actually write really smooth with a consistent amount of ink always! FYI the ends have a little cap on them when you first buy them that you have to peel off then it will write. I think they do this so the ink doesn't dry up or leak. Love these pens! Nothing else I've used compares!
customer_reviews.author: LOVETHEBEACH21

customer_reviews.title: Made for lefty’s and writes great!
customer_reviews.text: They write great! Amazing to have a clicky pen that lefty’s can use without it unscrewing! You unscrew from the top of the pen instead of the bottom so left handed people this pen is for you! I’ve gotten their colored pens before and they didn’t write so well. But these work great!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Love

customer_reviews.title: Jammed after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: It was heavy on the ink but I could deal with that but It stopped working only after a few uses. The clicker jammed and wouldn't work. Very disappointing. Bought them for my employees to use in our garden center so it's important we have something that we can depend on when we help our customers. I haven't asked my employees if there's are still working but I can't imagine I got the only one. I'll be looking for a different one that I can depend on. I depend on the ratings. This one failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg reed

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pens, but there one missing in the box! 😕
customer_reviews.text: Those are my favorite pens. They are light weight, have a comfortable grip, a soft writing and a beautiful shade of blue. But, unfortunately I am a little bit disappointed because I bought a box of 12 pens, but only received 11.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Writes like a 0.5mm
customer_reviews.text: Says 1.0mm but write like and has a fine point
customer_reviews.author: JustJenn

customer_reviews.title: Co-workers love these pens!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work. My coworkers prefer my pens (these), instead of the other more spendy red pens my work provides. They are easy to use (no air bubbles), and write smoothly. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my son for school
customer_reviews.text: My sons classes required red and blue pens so I ordered these for him. The price is great, they feel nice when held and writes nicely. He's been using them since school started and there's been no complaints. He likes them. For a 6th grader to say he likes something as simple as pens is a great complement.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I started dot journaling and wanted some colorful pens that are durable and easy to hold. I've always like Paper Mate pens anyways so I decided to give these a try. I was ecstatic to learn that you get two of each color (yay for not reading description). They colors are true to what the outside color is and have worked fantastically for my dot journal. I also was impressed with the price due to trying to find something at Wal-Mart and these were cheaper. Definitely great value.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on quality ink pens EVER
customer_reviews.text: These ink pens are amazing..and you get 48!! Never run out of pens again...They write smooth and perfect feeling in your hand when writing...I like to write letters, yes, even in 2019! I wrote my sister a 10 page letter and the pen never skipped...smooth writing! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Family loves to use these pens!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, even writing, convenient retractable click top, bright, Beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelyle

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: These pens make writing so much more enjoyable. The triangular shape is very comfortable even in my hand. There is no drag against the paper and the ball is very smooth. There is no ink bleeding either. The ink colors are bright and clear. It's been many years since I used Papermate products, but I am convinced they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Love the color variety!
customer_reviews.text: The color variety & smooth ink flow are winners. Primarily use for Bible marking & keep a paper towel handy to blot the occasional ink blob at the start of an underline. Good retractable color pens!
customer_reviews.author: BNZ

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These pens are replacing my past favorite pens. I love these. They don't smear and are smooth moving. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have wanted
customer_reviews.text: The colors are exactly as advertised. Not disappointed by any means. I will buy these regularly as I love writing with colors to brighten up the world. I even have people at work buying them now.
customer_reviews.author: Lock

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best pens I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best pens I’ve ever had!! I am a teacher and like to have lots of different colors to work with, these pens have great color and write smoother than any pen I’ve used before and are for a great price. I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors.
customer_reviews.text: I opened this and started to use some of the them. Saddly one of the colors breaks up and can't write with it well. light blue one. But over all I like this. makes a great gift and makes my letters I send to my cousin lil more fun. At least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Smooth writing and durable
customer_reviews.text: Smooth writing and durable, will purchase again. Pens provided at work do not work long and usually end up messy. I am not a fan of gel pens and wanted a good reliable pen. I first purchased the two pens set at store and once I found that I like them I searched amazon and found a box of them. My employees and peers have been asking for them. Will need a new box soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I love school supplies so anytime that I can find some that are of nice quality and are cheap, I buy them. These do their kid, which is to put ink on the paper. The only thing that I don’t like is that sometimes they have a hard time closing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Pens Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I got these pens for my little granddaughters to play with. To me, the colors were not bright enough so that they thought they were fun to use which is my whole idea when I buy toys and crafts. I have my grandchildren over every week so I like to have many things to keep them occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Bayer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!! WELL WORTH THE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pens!! I love how they are retractable!@ fast delivery!! Thank you..I love writing in my journal with different colors!! So these are perfect for that!! I also color codemy scheduling book!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer remuck

customer_reviews.title: not a full box!
customer_reviews.text: box is supposed to have 12 pens but only had 10!!! Better than the last time when I got an empty bag!! I don't know what the problem is.
customer_reviews.author: LoreeLyn53

product_meta.title: Paper Mate InkJoy 100RT Retractable Ballpoint Pens, Medium Point, Assorted, 20 Pack (1951396)
product_meta.description: Style:100RT| Color:Assorted| Size:20 CountSpread joy with vivid color! Paper Mate ink joy 100RT retractable ballpoint pens have a smooth, fast-starting writing system that spreads ink easily so writing never a drag. Even work or school is fun when you can choose from a Rainbow of ten brilliant colors and enjoy ink that flows as freely as your thoughts. Brighten up every page and make writing more fun with Paper Mate ink joy ballpoint pens.
feature_bullets: Ultra smooth ink keeps the fun and ideas flowing
Reliable and fluid 1.0 millimeter medium tip draw clean lines from beginning to end
Retractable design is ready to write with just a satisfying click
Colorful ink in 10 bright shades adds fun to every page
Includes: 2 magenta, 2 red, 2 orange, 2 lime, 2 green, 2 turquoise, 2 blue, 2 purple, 2 Mocha and 2 black ballpoint pens

Paper Mate participates in Box Tops for Education; Since packaging may vary, to redeem a Box Top on a purchase without the proper packaging, contact Sanford/Newell Customer Care at the number on the back of packaging who will then validate your purchase

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,639 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
